Label: Contributor description
Description: Brief text describing a contributor to the product, at the publisher’s discretion. Optional, and repeatable to provide parallel descriptions in multiple languages. The language attribute is optional for a single instance of <ContributorDescription>, but must be included in each instance if <ContributorDescription> is repeated. It may be used with either a person or corporate name, to draw attention to any aspect of a contributor’s background which supports the promotion of the book.
Format: Variable length text, suggested maximum length 200 characters. XHTML is enabled in this element – see Using XHTML, HTML, XML, JSON within ONIX text fields
Example: <ContributorDescription>Skipper of the winning crew in the Americas Cup, 1998</ContributorDescription>
